universities package¶

Submodules¶

universities.api module¶

class universities.api.API(encoding='utf-8')[source]¶

Bases: object

API object for making requests to the university database.

endpoint = 'http://universities.hipolabs.com/search'¶
get_all()[source]¶

Return a generator containing all university data. This is simply a wrapper on search() which does not do any filtering.

Return type:generator of models.University objects
lucky(name='', country_code='', country='')[source]¶

Search for a university in the database, and only return the first result. This is simply a wrapper on search() that takes the resulting generator and returns the first element if it exists. Each available option can be used to narrow down search results.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – The name of the university.
  • country_code (str) – An ISO-3166 2-letter country code.
  • country (str) – The country of the university.
Return type:

A models.University object
search(name='', country_code='', country='')[source]¶

Search for a university in the database. Each available option can be used to narrow down saerch results.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – The name of the university.
  • country_code (str) – An ISO-3166 2-letter country code.
  • country (str) – The country of the university.
Return type:

generator of models.University objects
